app.desc:
The PJRC Teensy 3.2 is a small, complete, and breadboard-friendly board based on the Freescale MK20DX256 32 bit ARM Cortex-M4.
developed in conjunction with Arduino,

It has 24 5V tolerance digital input/output pins for breadboard use (of which 10 can be used as PWM outputs and 10 as analog inputs), a 72 MHz crystal oscillator (Can be overclocked to 96MHz).

It sports 256K Flash Memory, 64K RAM, 2K EEPROM.

In order to program the teensy through the Arduino IDE, all you have to do is to download & install the Teensyduino add-on.
